name: Moong
description:
So I wanted to make something for the Game Off Jam but didn't have so much time and ideas during this month.

But then of course I had one idea at 10pm of the last day. So I made this thing in a few hours.

It's like the classic Pong, but you control the 4 paddles with your mouse and you need to beat your record of bounces!

Oh, and I made the ball yellow so that it looks like a moon and seems related to the game theme.
